conduits.name: Reverberation
conduits.description: Echoing Reprimand's damage is increased by <dynamic>50% - 120%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Sudden Fractures
conduits.description: Serrated Bone Spike's bleed has a <dynamic>3.0% - 10%</dynamic> chance to deal its damage a second time.

conduits.name: Septic Shock
conduits.description: Sepsis's damage over time is increased by <dynamic>50% - 190%</dynamic>, reduced by 10% each time it deals damage.

conduits.name: Slaughter Scars
conduits.description: Slaughter's damage and critical strike chance are increased by <dynamic>12% - 40%</dynamic>, or by <dynamic>24%</dynamic> if Slaughter Poison is active.

conduits.name: Nimble Fingers
conduits.description: Energy cost of Feint and Crimson Vial reduced by <dynamic>5 - 20</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Recuperator
conduits.description: Slice and Dice heals you for up to <dynamic>18.0% - 54%</dynamic> of your maximum health over 36 sec.

conduits.name: Cloaked in Shadows
conduits.description: Entering Stealth cloaks you in shadows, absorbing <dynamic>10.0% - 24%</dynamic> of your maximum health in damage, reduced by 1% each second outside of Stealth.

conduits.name: Quick Decisions
conduits.description:
<spec>Outlaw (Level 18)</spec>
<dynamic>Grappling Hook - Grappling Hook</dynamic>

<spec>Assassination</spec><spec>Subtlety</spec>
<dynamic>Shadowstep</dynamic>

's cooldown is reduced by 10%, and its maximum range is increased by <dynamic>12%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Fade to Nothing
conduits.description: Gaining Stealth, Vanish, or Shroud of Concealment increases movement speed by <dynamic>10% - 25%</dynamic> for 3 sec.

conduits.name: Rushed Setup
conduits.description: The Energy costs of Kidney Shot, Cheap Shot, Sap, and Distract are reduced by <dynamic>(-- 10)% - (-- 45)%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Prepared for All
conduits.description:
Dodging attacks reduces the remaining cooldown of Evasion by <dynamic>1.0 sec - 4 sec</dynamic>.

Successful interrupts with Kick reduce the remaining cooldown of Cloak of Shadows by <dynamic>2.0 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Poisoned Katar
conduits.description: Fan of Knives's damage is increased by <dynamic>8% - 36%</dynamic>, and it has a <dynamic>8%</dynamic> increased poison application chance.

conduits.name: Well-Placed Steel
conduits.description: Shiv's damage is increased by <dynamic>100% - 300%</dynamic> on bleeding targets, and it extends the duration of your Envenom by <dynamic>1.0 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Maim, Mangle
conduits.description: Garrote increases the damage of your Mutilate on the target by <dynamic>20% - 60%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Lethal Poisons
conduits.description: The instant damage of your lethal poisons is increased by <dynamic>30% - 100%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Triple Threat
conduits.description: Sinister Strike has a <dynamic>20% - 35%</dynamic> chance to strike with both weapons after it strikes an additional time.

conduits.name: Ambidexterity
conduits.description: Main Gauche has an additional <dynamic>10% - 24%</dynamic> chance to strike while Blade Flurry is active.

conduits.name: Sleight of Hand
conduits.description: Roll the Bones has a <dynamic>7.0% - 21%</dynamic> chance of instantly resetting its cooldown.

conduits.name: Count the Odds
conduits.description:
Ambush

<condition>Slaughter</condition>
<dynamic>Slaughter</dynamic>

 and Dispatch have a <dynamic>7.0%</dynamic> chance to grant you a Roll the Bones combat enhancement buff you do not already have for 5 sec.

Duration and chance tripled while Stealthed.

conduits.name: Deeper Daggers
conduits.description: Eviscerate and Shadow Vault increase your Shadow damage dealt by <dynamic>30% - 150%</dynamic> for 5 sec.

conduits.name: Planned Execution
conduits.description: Symbols of Death increases your critical strike chance by <dynamic>6.0% - 34%</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Stiletto Staccato
conduits.description: Shadow Techniques now also reduces the remaining cooldown of Shadow Blades by <dynamic>1.0 sec - 2.5 sec</dynamic>.

conduits.name: Perforated Veins
conduits.description: Shadowstrike increases the damage of your next Backstab by <dynamic>30% - 100%</dynamic>, stacking up to 3 times.

covenants.name: Summon Steward
covenants.description:
Call your steward to bring you a Phial of Serenity that can be consumed to restore 20% health and remove all Curse, Disease, Poison, and Bleed effects.

Your Steward additionally offers access to a selection of useful amenities for 4 min.

covenants.name: Purify Soul
covenants.description: Restores 20% health and removes all diseases, poisons, curses, and bleeds affecting you.

covenants.name: Soulshape
covenants.description:
Turn into a Vulpin, teleporting 15 yds forward and increasing your movement speed by 50%. You may reactivate Soulshape every few sec to teleport again.

Lasts 12 sec, or indefinitely while in a rest area.

covenants.name: Flicker
covenants.description: Teleports you forward 15 yds or until reaching an obstacle.

covenants.name: Fleshcraft
covenants.description:
Form a shield of flesh and bone over 4 sec that absorbs damage equal to 20% of your maximum health for 2 min.

Channeling near a corpse claims their essence to grow the shield, up to 50% of your maximum health. This is most effective against powerful enemies.

covenants.name: Door of Shadows
covenants.description: Wend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

covenants.name: Echoing Reprimand
covenants.description:
Deal (60% of Attack power) Arcane damage to an enemy, extracting their anima to Animacharge a combo point.

Damaging finishing moves that consume the same number of combo points as your Animacharge deal damage as if they consume 7 combo points.

<dynamic>Awards 3 combo point.</dynamic>

covenants.name: Sepsis
covenants.description:
Infect the target's blood, dealing (162.89% of Attack power) Nature damage over 10 sec. If the target survives its full duration, they suffer an additional (77.5667% of Attack power) damage and you Vanish from sight.

Cooldown reduced by 60 sec if Sepsis does not last its full duration.

covenants.name: Serrated Bone Spike
covenants.description:
Embed a bone spike in the target, dealing (60% of Attack power) Bleed damage every 3 sec until they die. Deals (60% of Attack power) damage and generates 1 Combo Point per active bone spike.

Refunds 1 charge when target dies or is healed to full.

<dynamic>Awards 1 combo point.</dynamic>

covenants.name: Slaughter
covenants.description:
Slaughter the target, dealing (95.472% of Attack power) Physical damage. The target's anima mixes with your lethal poison, replacing it with a more powerful lethal poison for the next 5 minutes.

Slaughter Poison deals Shadow damage over 12 sec. and steals 15% of healing done to the target.

<dynamic>Awards 2 combo point.</dynamic>

legendaries.name: Mark of the Master Assassin
legendaries.description: While Stealth is active and for 5 sec after breaking Stealth, your Critical Strike chance is increased by 100%.

legendaries.name: Tiny Toxic Blades
legendaries.description: Shiv causes your Poisons and Bleeds on the target to spread to a nearby enemy.

legendaries.name: Essence of Bloodfang
legendaries.description: Your combo point generating abilities have a chance to infect the target with Bloodfang, causing 0 Bleed damage over 6 sec, and healing the Rogue for 0 each time it deals damage.

legendaries.name: Invigorating Shadowdust
legendaries.description: Vanish reduces the remaining cooldown of your other abilities by 15 sec.

legendaries.name: Dashing Scoundrel
legendaries.description: Envenom also increases the critical strike chance of your poisons by 30%, and their critical strikes generate 2 Energy.

legendaries.name: Doomblade
legendaries.description:
Mutilate deals an additional 20% Bleed damage over 8 sec.

Envenom damage increased by 5% for each Bleed you have on the target.

legendaries.name: Zoldyck Insignia
legendaries.description: Your Poisons and Bleeds deal 30% increased damage to targets below 30% health.

legendaries.name: Duskwalker's Patch
legendaries.description: The remaining cooldown on Vendetta is reduced by 1 sec for every 65 Energy you expend.

legendaries.name: Greenskin's Wickers
legendaries.description: Between the Eyes has a 20% chance per Combo Point to increase the damage of your next Pistol Shot by 200%.

legendaries.name: Guile Charm
legendaries.description: Take advantage of the natural ebb and flow of combat, causing your Sinister Strike to gradually increase your damage dealt by up to 30%. This maximum effect will last for 15 sec before fading and beginning the cycle anew.

legendaries.name: Celerity
legendaries.description: Adrenaline Rush increases your damage by 15%, and you have a chance while Slice and Dice is active to gain the Adrenaline Rush effect for 4 sec.

legendaries.name: Concealed Blunderbuss
legendaries.description: When Sinister Strike hits an additional time, there is a 33% chance that your next Pistol Shot will fire 3 additional times.

legendaries.name: Finality
legendaries.description: Eviscerate, Rupture, and Shadow Vault increase the damage of your next use of the finishing move by 20%.

legendaries.name: Akaari's Soul Fragment
legendaries.description: After using Shadowstrike or Cheap Shot, your target suffers a Shadowstrike from the shadows 2 sec later, at 50% effectiveness as Shadow damage.

legendaries.name: The Rotten
legendaries.description:
For 2 sec after activating Symbols of Death, your Shadowstrike and 

<condition>Gloomblade</condition>
<dynamic>Gloomblade</dynamic>

Backstab generate 4 additional combo points.

legendaries.name: Deathly Shadows
legendaries.description: Vanish grants 5 combo points and increases all damage dealt by 15% for 10 sec.
